titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4475) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-941, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 299.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4475 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 612.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 244 - 136 (Roll no. 515).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/5/2000--Introduced. Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4475 (Department of Transportation and related agencies appropriations).
